COMMIT.MESSAGE: compat api: allow default bridge name for networks Docker uses "bridge" as default network name so some tools expect this to work with network list or inspect. To fix this we change "bridge" to the podman default ("podman") name. Fixes #14983 Signed-off-by: Paul Holzinger <pholzing@redhat.com>
